topic.title: What's new in Release 19.1
topic.p: For Mingle onsite customers, please review the upgrade instructions before moving to Mingle 19.1.

note.p: All of the features below are already available for our Mingle in the cloud customers.

section.title: Bug Fixes
section.item: Fixed issue with charts where DHC would not show up on pages with special characters in the name.
Fixed issue with export caused by large data in cells and number of rows exceeding Excel limits.
